response_text: <rss xmlns:media="http://search.yahoo.com/mrss/" xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" xmlns:atom="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom" xmlns:content="http://purl.org/rss/1.0/modules/content/" version="2.0"><channel><atom:link href="http://feed.cnet.com/feed/news" rel="self" type="application/rss+xml" /><title>CNET News</title><description>CNET news editors and reporters provide top technology news, with investigative reporting and in-depth coverage of tech issues and events.</description><image><url>http://i.i.cbsi.com/cnwk.1d/i/ne/gr/prtnr/CNET_Logo_150.gif</url><title>CNET News</title><link><![CDATA[ http://www.cnet.com/#ftag=CAD590a51e ]]></link></image><link><![CDATA[ http://www.cnet.com/#ftag=CAD590a51e ]]></link><item><title>Air France partners with Cannes to let you finish watching your film after you land - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/air-france-partners-with-cannes-to-let-you-finish-watching-your-film-after-you-land/#ftag=CAD590a51e</link><guid isPermaLink="false">731f6fc2-7dc6-49d0-a114-70277147861c</guid><pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 06:27:20 +0000</pubDate><description>Landing already with the credits of your film nowhere in sight? Relax: Air France is letting you continue watching your film after you land.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet3.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/05/13/73153c6d-e4af-4dd9-9bd8-5e7f2304ddeb/thumbnail/300x230/6d8d02d2a8047b0d689d2ff5db1adb9f/cannes.jpg"/><dc:creator>Nic Healey</dc:creator></item><item><title>Take a virtual ride on the tallest, fastest and longest dive rollercoaster in the world - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/pov-video-valravn-tallest-fastest-and-longest-dive-rollercoaster-in-the-world/#ftag=CAD590a51e</link><guid isPermaLink="false">0756d303-76d1-4c6a-85e6-23c9e064d31d</guid><pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 05:31:45 +0000</pubDate><description>Settle down and enjoy a very safe ride on the Valravn dive coaster at Cedar Point in Ohio with this point-of-view video from the very front seat.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet4.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/05/13/e2ddab37-f674-4d24-be74-9603e61398c1/thumbnail/300x230/d27d76bbf35df2e854edfec158871b65/scary-pov-valravn.jpg"/><dc:creator>Nic Healey</dc:creator></item><item><title>Chainsaw art and the Doom game are made for each other - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/chainsaw-sculpture-doom-launch-video/#ftag=CAD590a51e</link><guid isPermaLink="false">c37cd037-1875-4f38-93bf-bbf897fe63ce</guid><pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 05:09:04 +0000</pubDate><description>Thought you were excited for Doom? Check out this Aussie artist carving a 2.4 metre tall wooden statue of a Revenant with a chainsaw.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet2.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2015/07/24/2d279457-c72a-4708-84e7-a627e25104e8/thumbnail/300x230/b8bd8b9414c2b7c1f97dd47fa6dea7ec/2910810-doom-multiplayer-handson-article-header.jpg"/><dc:creator>Nic Healey</dc:creator></item><item><title>Apple invests $1 billion in China's Uber competitor to 'learn more about the market' - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/apple-invests-1-billion-in-chinas-uber-competitor-to-learn-more-about-the-market/#ftag=CAD590a51e</link><guid isPermaLink="false">c30bc6cf-48bc-4f95-bd2c-d87213449f6e</guid><pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 03:34:07 +0000</pubDate><description>The iPhone maker is a strong contender in the Chinese market, but has hit some road blocks recently.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet1.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/02/26/bf8a651c-4c21-4ea3-8779-4dba079ce71e/thumbnail/300x230/fe0c401244fb28e8a0b9885d848ddf17/apple-event-sept9-2015-tim-cook-2480.jpg"/><dc:creator>Daniel Van Boom</dc:creator></item><item><title>Cassini provides most detailed image yet of Saturn's titanic storm - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/cassini-provides-most-detailed-image-yet-of-saturns-titanic-storm/#ftag=CAD590a51e</link><guid isPermaLink="false">9f57bfee-e06a-4975-be82-0b36d84b05b7</guid><pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 04:36:29 +0000</pubDate><description>The giant storm raging at Saturn's south pole has been revealed in more detail than ever before -- and the storm is more complex than first thought.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet4.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/05/13/ccaf825e-2da3-4f7a-ac5b-01b45365b23d/thumbnail/300x230/1933e330b307c73d5c2eecc5cf04460c/saturnstorm.jpg"/><dc:creator>Michelle Starr</dc:creator></item><item><title>'Honest Trailers' creator talks about that huge 'Deadpool' cameo (Tomorrow Daily 364 show notes) - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/honest-trailers-deadpool-cameo-andy-signore-screenjunkies-tomorrow-daily-podcast-364/#ftag=CAD590a51e</link><guid isPermaLink="false">69cdb3b1-8cf3-4d56-859f-6ac4b0d8159f</guid><pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 03:00:03 +0000</pubDate><description>We deep dive into the "Ghostbusters" hyper-reality experience, MIT's Materiables platform and Hyperloop One's first test. Also, we welcome Andy Signore to the show to discuss creating "Honest Trailers" and how they got Ryan Reynolds to cameo.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet1.cbsistatic.com/feed/bundles/cnetcss/images/feeds/default.jpg"/><dc:creator>Ashley Esqueda</dc:creator></item><item><title>Archie and Supergirl TV series fly over to The CW - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/riverdale-supergirl-tv-series-the-cw-archie-cbs/#ftag=CAD590a51e</link><guid isPermaLink="false">bf6effe6-526f-41ca-90ca-981e0b01a416</guid><pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 03:21:24 +0000</pubDate><description>Archie Andrews and Kara Danvers are set to join Green Arrow, the Flash and all the Legends of Tomorrow as The CW orders up a serve of the "Riverdale" TV series and scores "Supergirl" from CBS.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet1.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2015/05/18/0ae684c4-f609-4c46-91ef-df96363c3c61/thumbnail/300x230/21c53450b6b5270cbfa919b21d77c905/supergirl1.jpg"/><dc:creator>Nic Healey</dc:creator></item><item><title>Zuckerberg says 'no evidence' found supporting Trendinggate charges - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/zuckerberg-says-no-evidence-found-supporting-trendingate-charges/#ftag=CAD590a51e</link><guid isPermaLink="false">8fe7a8d1-9f38-453e-a2e7-81ef85a3a083</guid><pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 05:20:55 +0000</pubDate><description>Facebook CEO says he will take steps to address the issue if an internal investigation finds evidence of suppressed news.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet4.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/04/12/f4664c80-6699-44a3-a1ed-e20d17fad066/thumbnail/300x230/39166055f9ca3a49aba3647ce60b0377/f8-facebook-mark-zuckerberg-0112.jpg"/><dc:creator>Steven Musil</dc:creator></item><item><title>This origami robot can retrieve the batteries you swallow - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/this-origami-robot-can-retrieve-the-batteries-you-swallow/#ftag=CAD590a51e</link><guid isPermaLink="false">89709b70-c8ae-4297-9144-5cbbf1f7ff3b</guid><pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 03:25:22 +0000</pubDate><description>Researchers develop an ingestible origami robot that has demonstrated the ability to unfold and retrieve a button battery from a simulated stomach.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet3.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/05/13/afc8115d-606d-4872-a14d-0e1abc4e3c28/thumbnail/300x230/1ca9020acc3f65c9f087d7736704c933/batteryrobot.jpg"/><dc:creator>Michelle Starr</dc:creator></item><item><title>Overwatch open beta nabs 9.7 million players for Blizzard - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/overwatch-beta-9-7-million-players/#ftag=CAD590a51e</link><guid isPermaLink="false">360e5792-200e-4b01-9167-bca15624e87a</guid><pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 01:43:20 +0000</pubDate><description>It's a good sign for the gaming giant. For comparison, Blizzard's popular World of Warcraft had around 12 million players at its peak.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet3.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/04/06/6e3c0603-6a88-4eb4-88ed-5b6f6f2a099d/thumbnail/300x230/1cdacbb62eaff4d7b3ba267b1e22d502/2721729-winstonoverwatch007.jpg"/><dc:creator>Luke Lancaster</dc:creator></item><item><title>Watching porn regularly may make you more religious, study says - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/watching-porn-regularly-makes-you-more-religious-study-says/#ftag=CAD590a51e</link><guid isPermaLink="false">46618364-81bc-441c-a25d-aaa49ea10ef6</guid><pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 01:00:26 +0000</pubDate><description>Technically Incorrect: A researcher at the University of Oklahoma theorizes that guilt might be involved.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet2.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2011/11/17/ad2e2e50-8533-11e3-bc97-14feb5ca9861/thumbnail/300x230/43c0de32f7b9ee3a18863d7645802aa4/newsfdXXX.jpg"/><dc:creator>Chris Matyszczyk</dc:creator></item><item><title>​Frinkiac has a GIF generator? I am in flavour country! - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/frinkiac-has-a-gif-generator-i-am-in-flavour-country/#ftag=CAD590a51e</link><guid isPermaLink="false">b86fe77e-aaa7-41bc-b59c-a5d08fd658e4</guid><pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 01:12:15 +0000</pubDate><description>You can now turn your favourite moments from "The Simpsons" into animated GIFs. That's it...I'm going to clown college.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet1.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/05/13/c17ba375-bd7d-43ff-acd1-994f89dc0d01/thumbnail/300x230/6520ebc587a2ddb452b848f96f576a63/frinkiac-homer-gorging-still.jpg"/><dc:creator>Claire Reilly</dc:creator></item><item><title>Facebook spells out what's trending - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/facebook-trending-topics-guidelines-controversy/#ftag=CAD590a51e</link><guid isPermaLink="false">641d6734-bd78-40b5-9c87-dd1f2cb19481</guid><pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 00:51:55 +0000</pubDate><description>The social network sheds more light on how it decides which topics are trending, releasing its 28-page editorial guidelines.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet1.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2015/10/20/2a42384a-2c2f-439d-ba7e-9a73499e8981/thumbnail/300x230/c69b0cbdac559ac577daffc69732ddfc/42-59581407.jpg"/><dc:creator>Terry Collins</dc:creator></item><item><title>Pizza Hut delivers to top of Mount Kilimanjaro, but it takes more than 30 minutes - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/pizza-hut-delivers-to-top-of-mount-kilimanjaro-but-it-takes-more-than-30-minutes-and-went-cold/#ftag=CAD590a51e</link><guid isPermaLink="false">2e0ba306-e94c-4f5f-8b94-02d3d7b0e315</guid><pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 22:27:28 +0000</pubDate><description>Company sets world record for highest-altitude pizza delivery as it celebrates its first restaurant opening in Tanzania.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet1.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/05/12/b54f5942-a64e-4e31-afdb-2b1a1a0cc70e/thumbnail/300x230/074c7948591c3a564c1b16cf63a53413/pizzahut.jpg"/><dc:creator>Gael Fashingbauer Cooper</dc:creator></item><item><title>Apple Music gets Taylor Swift to lip-sync in British English - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/apple-music-gets-taylor-swift-into-dark-dancing/#ftag=CAD590a51e</link><guid isPermaLink="false">fe59ff60-6d24-49b6-915c-9d7693393cfd</guid><pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 22:19:19 +0000</pubDate><description>Technically Incorrect: A new Apple Music ad offers more of Taylor Swift. And more of Taylor Swift dancing to a song. This time, from an English band.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet3.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/05/12/389cf231-d139-42c0-988d-6d02c585ba47/thumbnail/300x230/39f9c06cbc0d5bf04b79cd32be7de456/swift567.jpg"/><dc:creator>Chris Matyszczyk</dc:creator></item><item><title>Theranos COO steps down amid federal probes - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/theranos-coo-steps-down-amid-federal-probes-blood-testing-sunny-balwani/#ftag=CAD590a51e</link><guid isPermaLink="false">e81e5b85-905a-4e0e-b614-fccec6ef65da</guid><pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 22:39:31 +0000</pubDate><description>Along with Theranos CEO Elizabeth Holmes, Sunny Balwani faces a possible two-year ban from the blood-testing business.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet1.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/05/12/f8c88422-f5ee-47d9-9cd0-2bf1352dbbb1/thumbnail/300x230/4b2ee467c882d8a7af8c5bb06bdc1098/gettyimages-491493468.jpg"/><dc:creator>Steven Musil</dc:creator></item><item><title>Will the Rio Olympics resemble 'Contagion'? - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/rio-olympics-zika-brazil-harvard-united-states/#ftag=CAD590a51e</link><guid isPermaLink="false">de318c65-7f61-4f83-af44-b4edb2961ded</guid><pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 21:59:58 +0000</pubDate><description>A new report says the Summer Games might make the Zika epidemic global.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet4.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/05/12/52df6c71-2495-4dca-b6d6-5f4d11dff5bb/thumbnail/300x230/f1180aa28e36a0fdf4edf1ebeed9f216/rio-olympics-logo.png"/><dc:creator>Terry Collins</dc:creator></item><item><title>How Google could make its own version of the Amazon Echo - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/how-google-could-make-its-own-version-of-the-amazon-echo/#ftag=CAD590a51e</link><guid isPermaLink="false">752b5ccb-ff7b-40cc-8de7-836df8098082</guid><pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 21:38:24 +0000</pubDate><description>The search giant is said to be working on a rival to Amazon's smart speaker. Meanwhile, it also just cooked up a handy iPhone keyboard -- but didn't release one for Android.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet3.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/05/12/70618f69-d857-4d39-a795-3992223989b1/thumbnail/300x230/69bba93b2ce64693a76b994106343c80/gboard-ios.jpg"/><dc:creator>Bridget Carey</dc:creator></item><item><title>Disney's working on robots that mimic people's movements - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/disneys-working-on-robots-that-mimic-peoples-movements-disney-research/#ftag=CAD590a51e</link><guid isPermaLink="false">cdb1123e-4dde-4882-a999-eb310776218c</guid><pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 21:36:14 +0000</pubDate><description>A prototype robot can do things like play a xylophone, thread string through the eye of a needle and play catch with a balloon.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet4.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/05/12/94edb880-cb56-4b3e-8fdc-6bd70dbb7ad5/thumbnail/300x230/f89e226e13ba64a68c1d2b55356d8df4/disney-robot.jpg"/><dc:creator>Shara Tibken</dc:creator></item><item><title>Researchers create machine that can detect love on a first date - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/this-machine-can-detect-love-on-a-first-date/#ftag=CAD590a51e</link><guid isPermaLink="false">53af6d1b-8aff-4c62-b4ec-9a577843cb57</guid><pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 20:59:59 +0000</pubDate><description>Technically Incorrect: Built by British researchers, it's based on "Blade Runner" and can save lovers so much money.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet2.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/05/12/35f0d5e6-e458-4001-96e1-3ee722e3618c/thumbnail/300x230/f4fcf725157c26bff6830473da38b80e/voight-kampff-lunews.jpg"/><dc:creator>Chris Matyszczyk</dc:creator></item><item><title>Audi's planning for one new EV every year starting 2018 - Roadshow</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/roadshow/news/audis-planning-for-one-new-ev-every-year-starting-in-2018/#ftag=CAD590a51e</link><guid isPermaLink="false">46b27a6f-7ce9-452f-b8ca-d3091044b3ff</guid><pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 20:35:52 +0000</pubDate><description>A new A8 is also due out next year, and it will feature semi-autonomous driving and automated parking.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet4.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2015/08/06/63a02cf0-5c8a-4aae-9195-b5cff2abd48b/thumbnail/300x230/896a1861386ae6a83bc3022b7326cc0e/news-2016-audi-a3-etron-exterior-05.jpg"/><dc:creator>Andrew Krok</dc:creator></item><item><title>Man claims Tesla crashed itself, Tesla claims data says otherwise - Roadshow</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/roadshow/news/owner-claims-tesla-crashed-itself-into-a-trailer-without-human-assistance/#ftag=CAD590a51e</link><guid isPermaLink="false">3065e875-b812-4a47-8775-40bd8cf24b66</guid><pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 21:14:52 +0000</pubDate><description>Well, this is certainly more interesting than originally thought.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet1.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/02/10/839c3324-59a7-4418-bd8a-914cc33df200/thumbnail/300x230/d92debc9e2e77860b5c23e5f633b7147/inline.png"/><dc:creator>Andrew Krok</dc:creator></item><item><title>Star Wars Battlefront Outer Rim DLC free trial period detailed - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/halo-5s-memories-of-reach-update-arrives-today-next-dlc-teased/#ftag=CAD590a51e</link><guid isPermaLink="false">797ea6cb-d5b1-4125-bc50-1679cb4c7a5c</guid><pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 21:32:26 +0000</pubDate><description>Infection, new multiplayer map, Noble Team armor and more come to Halo 5 today; watch first teaser for next DLC, too.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet2.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/05/12/076ef042-cf1b-4557-8ec1-3e0ee87e855d/thumbnail/300x230/f1ac893c2b3e8fc7e57fcb6a96ca2819/3061673-hogwild.jpg"/><dc:creator>GameSpot Staff</dc:creator></item><item><title>This tiny ancient Egyptian coffin hid a big secret for over a century - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/this-tiny-ancient-egyptian-coffin-hid-a-big-mystery-for-over-a-century/#ftag=CAD590a51e</link><guid isPermaLink="false">1995ef67-763f-4534-bdeb-b481dc91d473</guid><pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 20:00:19 +0000</pubDate><description>Researchers make a rare discovery when they look deep inside a extraordinary coffin collected decades ago from Egypt.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet1.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/05/12/9ff52097-5981-4890-9b40-8bb675e8ad69/thumbnail/300x230/692f3c852f27154b8babbe1124cc2f87/fitzwilliamcoffin.jpg"/><dc:creator>Amanda Kooser</dc:creator></item></channel></rss>
